con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.esb.com/crm/crmservice/biz" xmlns:bizmsg="http://www.esb.com/crm/crmservice/bizmsg" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:common="http://www.esb.com/crm/crmservice/common" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:jms="http://www.tibco.com/namespaces/ws/2004/soap/binding/JMS" xmlns:business="http://www.esb.com/crm/crmservice/biz"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.esb.com/crm/crmservice/common"> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Message command ID. OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="InterFrom" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the source of interface: 4050000 for BSS 4050001 for Bank 4050002 for SP ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="InterMode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The mode of interface 4050000 for Face to Face 4050001 for Website 4050002 for IVR ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="InterMedi" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Interaction Media if Website then give URL if IVR then give access number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="visitArea" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>visit area Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currentCell" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="additionInfo" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 1 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Reserve2" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 2 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Reserve3" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 3 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="PartnerID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of the partner when the session is generated by carrier it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system operator id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="TradePartnerID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of partner when the session is generated by partner it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="PartnerOperID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner operaor id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="BelToAreaID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>belong to area it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SerialNo" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system request serial number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Remark" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The remark information about this operation, it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates a code of success/failure, failure reasons. 405000000: success Other values: failure reasons</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SessionEntityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element
